mKuKbgl1yOeOcO4KT.name: Specialized
mKuKbgl1yOeOcO4KT.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

mngjuPt3lYoqlJyDN.name: Sympathy
mngjuPt3lYoqlJyDN.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

mY_VJaXSCrwsswt5S.name: Sympathy
mY_VJaXSCrwsswt5S.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mMZLdgzF6jtDlHAIb.name: Sympathy
mMZLdgzF6jtDlHAIb.notes: Death of one party kills the other

mMMqznvY2Oqvys97n.name: Sympathy
mMMqznvY2Oqvys97n.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

mu4GLNCOeGtwCMTib.name: Oxygen Storage
mu4GLNCOeGtwCMTib.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mMARYjX74Y2dY3D7f.name: Oxygen Storage
mMARYjX74Y2dY3D7f.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mvV7YFjpYgYH9sxRB.name: Oxygen Storage
mvV7YFjpYgYH9sxRB.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mT5QiJ-tralkuPQ31.name: Oxygen Storage
mT5QiJ-tralkuPQ31.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mR1tC3-G-L3TBcCgJ.name: Oxygen Storage
mR1tC3-G-L3TBcCgJ.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

m4o9vTpy6jrw7pt3U.name: Diffuse
m4o9vTpy6jrw7pt3U.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m3lVUr4S4WpC2ylt8.name: Homogenous
m3lVUr4S4WpC2ylt8.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mc8ex7_x3LHyQrcg_.name: No Blood
mc8ex7_x3LHyQrcg_.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

muya-YOARDu3eud0Z.name: No Brain
muya-YOARDu3eud0Z.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m4Taug4cmTHf2GYwK.name: No Eyes
m4Taug4cmTHf2GYwK.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mI_8mDHE1fHMykdwi.name: No Head
mI_8mDHE1fHMykdwi.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mqd1Y8xm1kRl_TAQy.name: No Neck
mqd1Y8xm1kRl_TAQy.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m_Fy6AQDkIHla2EgW.name: No Vitals
m_Fy6AQDkIHla2EgW.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

maSDdktePkrnJR38t.name: Unliving
maSDdktePkrnJR38t.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mV-x_3x1RqQy3TVQI.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mwgaLDQCdumgW3ILB.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
